summary: The Great McGonigle and his troupe of third-rate vaudevillians manage to stay one step ahead of the bill collectors and the sheriff.
cast: W.C. Fields|Joe Morrison|Baby LeRoy|Judith Allen|Jan Duggan|Tammany Young|Nora Cecil|Jack Mulhall|Samuel Ethridge|Ruth Marion|Richard Carle|Larry Grenier|William Blatchford|Jeffrey Williams|Donald Brown|Tom Miller|Lona Andre|Oscar Apfel|Dorothy Bay|Georgie Billings|Billy Bletcher|Davison Clark|Sam Flint|Otis Harlan|Dell Henderson|Maxine Elliott Hicks|Lew Kelly|James B. 'Pop' Kenton|Florence Lawrence|Edward LeSaint|Marvin Loback|Sam McDaniel|Robert McKenzie|Joseph Mills|Emma Ray|Oscar Smith|Monte Vandergrift|Clarence Wilson|Duke York
title: The Old Fashioned Way
